name: Bubbles (itch) (Clinery)
description:
A game where you pop bubbles with a spaceship. The bubbles burst into 4 smaller bubbles that move in a random direction. Inspired by the game asteroids (Wikipedia).

So far, this game has only been tested on 1 Linux computer and 3 different Windows computers. Bugs are very likely, so please report them here (GitHub).

Files/folders this game creates/uses

This game will create files in the config and cache locations of your operating system.

For operating systems supporting the XDG directories (e.g., most Linux distros): 

  • `~/.config/bubbles` for configuration files
  • `~/.local/share/bubbles` for log files

For Windows:

  • `%APPDATA%\Roaming\clinery\bubbles\data` for configuration files
  • `%APPDATA%\Local\clinery\bubbles\cache` for log files
System requirements Windows (Minimum)
  • A CPU newer than 2012
  • 6G of RAM
  • Any graphics card that supports Vulkan 1.1 (most things newer than 2012 and some older)
Linux(Minimum)
  • A CPU newer than 2012
  • 3G of RAM (Linux usually uses less RAM than Windows)
  • Any graphics card that supports Vulkan 1.1 (most things newer than 2012 and some older)
Where do I report issues?

At the GitHub page here (GitHub).

There is currently no way to disable log files, but that may change in a future release.
